# Charming (Staff)
## Overview
**Aura** moderate enchantment; **CL** 8th

**Slot** none

**Price** 17,600 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

Made of twisting wood ornately shaped and carved, this staff allows use of the following spells:

- *[[Charm Person (Spell)|Charm person]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Charm Monster (Spell)|Charm monster]]* (2 charges)

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Staff (Feat)|Craft Staff]], *[[Charm Person (Spell)|charm person]]**,* *[[Charm Monster (Spell)|charm monster]]*

**Cost** 8,800 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 492
